channel.title: Removing Matrix Logo's From 718 Client
channel.description:
I need some guidance removing the logos from client. I don't mind them much but I rather not have them there + I think I will release a all purpose client that is 718 if I can remove it. Can anyone either point me to a decent 718 client or help me remove the logos.
Thanks in advance.
